headline: REPORT: Republicans take victory lap after media confirms Hunter Biden laptop
author: DML News App
sentences:
As the most reliable and balanced news aggregation service on the internet, DML News App offers the following information published by TheHill.com:
Republicans are saying “we told you so” after the recent verification of emails from Hunter Biden’s laptop by major news organizations, which come amid the FBI investigation into foreign business dealings by President Joe Biden’s son.

Even I said, ‘that’s a big one, that’s a step too far.’ And now the New York Times just came out – and others – saying, really they’re saying they deceived the public.”
President Trump discusses the Hunter Biden laptop with RSBN’s Brian Glenn before rallying in Michigan https://t.co/Wr5H8zRRH7 pic.twitter.com/6oIyTDgNGO
Big Tech covered up Hunter Biden’s laptop.

— MediaResearchCenter (@theMRC) April 3, 2022
GOP cries “we told you so” on Hunter Biden https://t.co/BB6L1f6alP pic.twitter.com/r9yFZsfY3y

“Election integrity is threatened when Big Tech censors real stories that make their preferred candidate look bad,” House Minority Leader Kevin McCarthy (R-Calif) said in a tweet.

The article goes on to state the following:
It’s also likely a sign of what’s to come if Republicans win back the House and Senate majorities this fall — which would given them the chair’s gavels on panels and subpoena power.

— Rep. Matt Gaetz (@RepMattGaetz) March 29, 2022
“Twitter willfully interfered in an election by completely censoring the Hunter Biden laptop story in October 2020,” Rep. Lauren Boebert [R] tweeted Saturday.

Chuck Grassley (R-Iowa) and Ron Johnson (R-Wis.) launched a probe into the Biden family’s business dealings, and also presented records of Biden’s dealings with a Chinese company to the Senate last week.

— Rep. Jim Jordan (@Jim_Jordan) April 1, 2022
The Media Research Center pointed out that none of the “fact-checkers” on social media have updated their “checks” on the Hunter Biden laptop scandal.

The victory lap is also being accompanied by a new wave of action by Republicans related to Hunter Biden and his laptop — all just more than seven months before the midterm elections.

Twitter needs to face consequences for their disgraceful actions.”
